On Feb 20, 2007, at 5:11 PM, Hugh Winkler wrote:

> I don't think APP is a failure. I'm just saying you won't see
> significantly more "programmable web" using APP than you would have
> with SOAP.

I beg to differ -- REST + APP just means some more constraints, which  
IMO is a good thing for increasing understanding, which furthers the  
"programmable Web".

Stefan
